item.title: Techstack2023
item.description: After examining many job openings and frontend development trends here are some short and brief notes on what I think some good skills to have for 2023 will be for frontend development Creating a design system or component library Web3 frontend stack web3.js, ethers.js TypeScript + React Next.js GraphQL/REST/gRPC Experience with static page generation / server side rendering Golang or Nodejs backend experience for fullstack
